name: CacheManager
tagline: A generic IIS cache manager application.
body:
### CacheManager

This C# module can be added to any ASP.Net project and allows browsing and pruning of the ```HttpCache```

The project was inspired by [Steve Smith's CacheManager.axd](http://aspadvice.com/blogs/ssmith/archive/2006/01/29/Cache-Manager-Released.aspx) (released way back in 2006 on the AspAlliance site).

This re-implementation uses JSON serialization instead of XML serialization to show the values store and implements an opinionated view of how cache keys are constructed to allow a hierarchical view of the cache's current contents.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/CacheManager
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Authors and Contributors
This code was created by @aaron-p and maintained by @IDisposable
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
